page.title: 09A Day in the Life of .., (1)
page.content:
{ Sarah Webster.
Whatever time I wake up I never seem to have had enough sleep.It still takes me quarter of an hour to pull myself out of my warm cosy bed.Another day of school doesn't seem to inspire me to jump out of bed full of the joys of Spring! The rest of my family are normally already up and about,making breakfast and generally preparing for the day.Dad is a shift worker at{Norsk {Hydro Fertilizers}in Immingham so he often isn't at home in the morning. For the past few weeks my older sister Lucy has been getting up at 6.00 am to revise for her exams.She is very worried that she hasn't revised enough.My younger sister is usually charging about half-dressed demanding to know why she can't wear her tracksuit for school.We don't have a
